---
title: How I LOST $1516 in May 2025 trading options
description: Trading profits from May 2025
date: 2025-06-04
tags:
  - monthly report
  - trades
permalink: "/{{ title | slugify }}/"
---

Not a good month for me.

Just couldn't seem to string together any profitable days.

Also had a whole bunch of days which were going to be profitable, but ended up losing in the last 10 minutes of the day due to big price spikes/drops.

Overall, was my worst month of the year (so far).

Basically a breakeven month for non-0DTE trades.  If my commissions were less, would've made a tiny bit of money actually.

Maybe need to try and find a new broker.

Terrible month for 0DTE.  Just couldn't get any winning momentum going.

Also started experimenting with 1DTE which lost me like $500. 


## TOTALS

+ 0DTE + 1DTE Trades = -$1,516.14
+ Other Trades = -$26.63

**TOTAL PROFIT/LOSS = -$1542.77**

Total number of trades = 177

## Notes and Thoughts

Last month was very good.

This month was very bad.

Market was up, but quite choppy, resulting in lots of stop outs and losses in last 10-15 minutes of the day.

This month I also closed nearly double the number of the positions compared to last month.  I guess that shows that increasing number of trades doesn't always help.

Was also experimenting a lot with 1DTE trades, as well as longer term put broken wing butterflies / condors.

1DTE ended up being a big loser, although I only entered 6 positions, so it's still too early to tell.  After backtesting more, I also realized that I was entering on the wrong day, so probably could've eliminated some of the losses.

Broken wing butterflies made a tiny bit of money.  It's sort of complicated strategy, that I don't fully comprehend, so not sure if I will keep trading it.  I guess until it starts losing money.
